entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
